LanguageData.DoorsCloseFastAgain.TickExplanation: Time in this game is measured in ticks, one second has 60 ticks. So if you set the value to 60, it will take 1 second for doors to close after a colonist went through.
LanguageData.DoorsCloseFastAgain.NewTicksUntilClose: Ticks until doors close after someone went through:
